scripts.update-translations: wp i18n make-pot ./ && wp i18n update-po ./languages/janw-plugin-base.pot && wp i18n make-mo ./languages/

scripts-descriptions.phpcs: Run phpcs, Checks style and syntax agianst theh WordPress coding stadard.
scripts-descriptions.phpstan: Run phpstan, Checks styntax, docblock, non existing functions/classes.
scripts-descriptions.phprector: Run rector, Checks styntax, docblock, non existing functions/classes.
scripts-descriptions.ci: Run all the above syntax checkers at once.
scripts-descriptions.createzip: Will create a zip named 'plugin-slug.zip' in the plugin folder.
scripts-descriptions.createzip:downloads: Will create a zip named 'plugin-slug-0.1.0.zip' in the plugin folder.
scripts-descriptions.bumpversion: Update the plugin to a custom version. `composer bumpversion -- 0.10.0`
scripts-descriptions.bumpversion:major: Update the major version number, the first number.
scripts-descriptions.bumpversion:minor: Update the minor version number, the middle number.
scripts-descriptions.bumpversion:patch: Update the patch version number, the last number.
scripts-descriptions.publish-version: Commit the new version, tag it and push it.
